alert.note: Alert for Flagler; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:21PM EDT until May 18 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR FLAGLER AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS COUNTIES... At 421 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Crescent Beach to 9 miles northeast of Pierson, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Butler Beach, Beverly Beach, Espanola and Dupont Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
